typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Activité} as string,
		{Fournisseur Groupe} as string,
		{Société} as string,
		Code as string,
		Fournisseur as string,
		{Agence du client} as string,
		{Code article} as string,
		{Libellé article} as string,
		{Ref fournisseur} as string,
		{Qté Mois A-1} as string,
		{Qté Cumul A-1} as string,
		{CA Mois A-1} as string,
		{CA Cumul A-1} as string,
		{MB Mois A-1} as string,
		{MB Cumul A-1} as string,
		{VVA Mois A-1} as string,
		{VVA Cumul A-1} as string,
		{Qté Mois A} as string,
		{Qté Cumul A} as string,
		{CA Mois A} as string,
		{CA Cumul A} as string,
		{MB Mois A} as string,
		{MB Cumul A} as string,
		{VVA Mois A} as string,
		{VVA Cumul A} as string,
		yearmonth as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> MabilleSaunierDuvale
source(output(
		WholeSalerID as string,
		WholeSalerShortName as string,
		UnitID as string,
		POSid as string,
		POSdescription as string,
		County as string,
		POSSAMid as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		SupplierID as string,
		BrandID as string,
		WholeSalerHubID as string,
		HubName as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		SectorID as string,
		Commentaire as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> OrganisationMabilleSonac
source(output(
		year as string,
		reference as string,
		{Code client} as string,
		qte_ecoulement as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ventesDirectes
derivedColumn2 compose(mapColumn(
		id = idDecrementation,
		PossAMid = POSSAMidString,
		reference = {Ref fournisseur},
		year,
		month,
		qte_ecoulement = {Qté Mois A},
		qte_venteDirecte = qte_ecoulement
	),
	composition: 'decrementationVenteDirecte') ~> decrementationAnuel@(output1)
yearmonthNOTNULL derive(month = substring(yearmonth, 5, 2),
		year = substring(yearmonth, 1, 4),
		origin = "ecoulement") ~> ExtractYearAndMonth
ExtractYearAndMonth filter(not({Qté Mois A}=='0')) ~> FiltreQteMois
ExtractYearAndMonth filter({Qté Mois A}=='0') ~> FiltreQteMoisANull
FiltreQteMois filter({Ref fournisseur}!='') ~> FiltreRefFournisseur
FiltreRefFournisseur derive({Qté Mois A} = toDouble({Qté Mois A}),
		{Société} = iif(replace({Société}, " ", "") == replace("MABILLE - C.S.I.    ", " ", ""),"MABILLE" , {Société} )) ~> caEcoulementAndAgenceClient
caEcoulementAndAgenceClient filter({Agence du client} != '') ~> FiltreAgenceClient
OrganisationMabilleSonac filter(!isNull(POSid)) ~> FiltrePOSid
FiltrePOSid aggregate(groupBy(POSid,
		HubSAPid,
		UnitID),
	WholeSalerID = max(WholeSalerID),
		WholeSalerShortName = max(WholeSalerShortName),
		POSdescription = max(POSdescription),
		County = max(County),
		POSSAMidString = max(POSSAMidString),
		SupplierID = max(SupplierID),
		BrandID = max(BrandID),
		WholeSalerHubID = max(WholeSalerHubID),
		HubName = max(HubName),
		SectorID = max(SectorID),
		Commentaire = max(Commentaire)) ~> uniqueOrganisation
FiltreAgenceClient, uniqueOrganisation join(replace({Agence du client}," ","") == replace(POSid," ","")
	&& replace({Société}," ","") == replace(UnitID," ",""),
	joinType:'inner',
	matchType:'exact',
	ignoreSpaces: false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> innerOrganisation
select1, uniqueOrganisation join(replace({Agence du client}," ","") == replace(POSid," ","")
	&& replace({Société}," ","") == replace(UnitID," ",""),
	joinType:'left',
	matchType:'exact',
	ignoreSpaces: false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> leftOrganisation
leftOrganisation filter(isNull(POSid)) ~> leftOuterOrganisation
innerOrganisation, endVenteDirect join(ExtractYearAndMonth@year == select2@year
	&& coalesce(toString(toInteger(replace({Ref fournisseur}, " ", ""))),replace({Ref fournisseur}, " ", "")) == coalesce(toString(toInteger(replace(Article, " ", ""))),replace(Article, " ", ""))
	&& POSSAMidString == {Code client},
	joinType:'inner',
	matchType:'exact',
	ignoreSpaces: false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> innerVentesDirectes
innerOrganisation, endVenteDirect join(ExtractYearAndMonth@year == select2@year
	&& coalesce(toString(toInteger(replace({Ref fournisseur}, " ", ""))),replace({Ref fournisseur}, " ", "")) == coalesce(toString(toInteger(replace(Article, " ", ""))),replace(Article, " ", ""))
	&& POSSAMidString == {Code client},
	joinType:'left',
	matchType:'exact',
	ignoreSpaces: false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> leftVentesDirectes
leftVentesDirectes filter(isNull(torigin)) ~> leftOuterVentesDirectes
dropColumnsInCommon2, dropColumnsInCommon union(byName: true)~> fullLeftUnion
derivedColumn1 select(mapColumn(
		{Activité},
		{Fournisseur Groupe},
		{Société},
		Code,
		Fournisseur,
		{Agence du client},
		{Code article},
		{Libellé article},
		{Ref fournisseur},
		qte_ecc,
		{Qté Mois A-1},
		{Qté Cumul A-1},
		{VVA Mois A-1},
		{VVA Cumul A-1},
		{Qté Cumul A},
		{VVA Mois A},
		{VVA Cumul A},
		yearmonth,
		month,
		year,
		POSid,
		HubSAPid,
		WholeSalerID,
		WholeSalerShortName,
		UnitID,
		POSdescription,
		County,
		POSSAMidString,
		SupplierID,
		BrandID,
		WholeSalerHubID,
		HubName,
		SectorID,
		Commentaire
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> dropColumnsInCommon2
leftOuterVentesDirectes select(mapColumn(
		{Activité},
		{Fournisseur Groupe},
		{Société},
		Code,
		Fournisseur,
		{Agence du client},
		{Code article},
		{Libellé article},
		{Ref fournisseur},
		{Qté Mois A-1},
		{Qté Cumul A-1},
		{VVA Mois A-1},
		{VVA Cumul A-1},
		qte_ecc = {Qté Mois A},
		{Qté Cumul A},
		{VVA Mois A},
		{VVA Cumul A},
		yearmonth,
		month,
		year = ExtractYearAndMonth@year,
		POSid,
		HubSAPid,
		WholeSalerID,
		WholeSalerShortName,
		UnitID,
		POSdescription,
		County,
		POSSAMidString,
		SupplierID,
		BrandID,
		WholeSalerHubID,
		HubName,
		SectorID,
		Commentaire
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> dropColumnsInCommon
Addcolumn select(mapColumn(
		marque_file = {Fournisseur Groupe},
		agence_code = {Agence du client},
		article = {Libellé article},
		reference = {Ref fournisseur},
		qte_ecoulement = qte_ecc,
		yearmonth,
		month,
		year,
		HubSAPid,
		WholeSalerShortName,
		UnitID,
		POSdescription,
		County,
		POSSAMidString,
		marque_id = BrandID,
		HubName,
		distributeur
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> uniformisation
fullLeftUnion derive(distributeur = "MABILLE") ~> Addcolumn
select2 derive(torigin = "vente direct") ~> endVenteDirect
MabilleSaunierDuvale filter(!isNull(yearmonth)) ~> yearmonthNOTNULL
FiltreAgenceClient select(mapColumn(
		{Activité},
		{Fournisseur Groupe},
		{Société},
		Code,
		Fournisseur,
		{Agence du client},
		{Code article},
		{Libellé article},
		{Ref fournisseur},
		{Qté Mois A-1},
		{Qté Cumul A-1},
		{CA Mois A-1},
		{CA Cumul A-1},
		{MB Mois A-1},
		{MB Cumul A-1},
		{VVA Mois A-1},
		{VVA Cumul A-1},
		{Qté Mois A},
		{Qté Cumul A},
		{CA Mois A},
		{CA Cumul A},
		{MB Mois A},
		{MB Cumul A},
		{VVA Mois A},
		{VVA Cumul A},
		yearmonth,
		month,
		year,
		origin
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> select1
ventesDirectes select(mapColumn(
		year,
		Article = reference,
		{Code client},
		qte_ecoulement
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> select2
endVenteDirect filter({Code client}=='16007943' && Article=='0010021497' &&year=='202104') ~> filter1
join1 derive(qte_ecc = qt_final) ~> derivedColumn1
select4 keyGenerate(output(idDecrementation as long),
	startAt: 1L,
	stepValue: 1L) ~> idDecrementation
idDecrementation select(mapColumn(
		idDecrementation,
		POSSAMidString,
		{Ref fournisseur},
		year,
		month,
		{Qté Mois A},
		qte_ecoulement
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> select3
select3 derive(month = toInteger(month),
		{Qté Mois A} = toFloat({Qté Mois A}),
		qte_ecoulement = toFloat(qte_ecoulement)) ~> derivedColumn2
idDecrementation, decrementationAnuel@output1 join(idDecrementation == id,
	joinType:'inner',
	matchType:'exact',
	ignoreSpaces: false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> join1
innerVentesDirectes select(mapColumn(
		{Activité},
		{Fournisseur Groupe},
		{Société},
		Code,
		Fournisseur,
		{Agence du client},
		{Code article},
		{Libellé article},
		{Ref fournisseur},
		{Qté Mois A-1},
		{Qté Cumul A-1},
		{CA Mois A-1},
		{CA Cumul A-1},
		{MB Mois A-1},
		{MB Cumul A-1},
		{VVA Mois A-1},
		{VVA Cumul A-1},
		{Qté Mois A},
		{Qté Cumul A},
		{CA Mois A},
		{CA Cumul A},
		{MB Mois A},
		{MB Cumul A},
		{VVA Mois A},
		{VVA Cumul A},
		yearmonth,
		month,
		year = ExtractYearAndMonth@year,
		origin,
		POSid,
		HubSAPid,
		UnitID,
		WholeSalerID,
		WholeSalerShortName,
		POSdescription,
		County,
		POSSAMidString,
		SupplierID,
		BrandID,
		WholeSalerHubID,
		HubName,
		SectorID,
		Commentaire,
		Article,
		{Code client},
		qte_ecoulement,
		torigin
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> select4
uniformisation filter(POSSAMidString=='16007943' &&   year=='2021') ~> filter4
uniformisation sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Org_commerciale as string,
		{Canal distribution} as string,
		{Secteur d'activit�} as string,
		{Document de vente} as string,
		Poste as string,
		{Jour calendaire} as string,
		{Agence commerciale corrig�} as string,
		{ATC Corrig�} as string,
		{Donneur d'ordre} as string,
		{Recept de march} as string,
		{Destinataire facture} as string,
		{Type doc vente} as string,
		{Type de poste} as string,
		Livraison as string,
		{Type de livraison} as string,
		{Type poste Livraison} as string,
		Facture as string,
		{Type de facture} as string,
		{Type poste Facture} as string,
		{Mois calendrier} as string,
		{Ann�e civile} as string,
		{Motif commande} as string,
		{CA cd�} as string,
		{Qt� livr�e} as string,
		{CA livr�} as string,
		{Qt� factur�e} as string,
		{CA factur�} as string,
		{Cout standard cd�} as string,
		{Cout fabrication} as string,
		{Cout standard livr�} as string,
		{Cout standard factur�} as string,
		date_id as string,
		year as string,
		yearmonth as string,
		qt_cd_e as string,
		ca_cd_ as string,
		qt_factur_e as string,
		ca_factur_ as string,
		reference as string,
		WholeSalerID as string,
		WholeSalerHubID as string,
		HubName as string,
		{P�riode} as string,
		Offre as string,
		month as string,
		qte_ecoulement as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		distributeur as string,
		agence_code as string,
		marque as string,
		{Code postal} as string,
		marque_name as string,
		qte_ecc as string,
		ca_ecoulement as string,
		data_origin as string,
		{Ecoulement origin} as string,
		canal_final as string,
		{ATC performance} as string,
		Canal as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['MABILLE_ECOUL_PREPARED.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> MABILLEECOULPREPARED
FiltreQteMoisANull sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Org_commerciale as string,
		{Canal distribution} as string,
		{Secteur d'activit�} as string,
		{Document de vente} as string,
		Poste as string,
		{Jour calendaire} as string,
		{Agence commerciale corrig�} as string,
		{ATC Corrig�} as string,
		{Donneur d'ordre} as string,
		{Recept de march} as string,
		{Destinataire facture} as string,
		{Type doc vente} as string,
		{Type de poste} as string,
		Livraison as string,
		{Type de livraison} as string,
		{Type poste Livraison} as string,
		Facture as string,
		{Type de facture} as string,
		{Type poste Facture} as string,
		{Mois calendrier} as string,
		{Ann�e civile} as string,
		{Motif commande} as string,
		{CA cd�} as string,
		{Qt� livr�e} as string,
		{CA livr�} as string,
		{Qt� factur�e} as string,
		{CA factur�} as string,
		{Cout standard cd�} as string,
		{Cout fabrication} as string,
		{Cout standard livr�} as string,
		{Cout standard factur�} as string,
		date_id as string,
		year as string,
		yearmonth as string,
		qt_cd_e as string,
		ca_cd_ as string,
		qt_factur_e as string,
		ca_factur_ as string,
		reference as string,
		WholeSalerID as string,
		WholeSalerHubID as string,
		HubName as string,
		{P�riode} as string,
		Offre as string,
		month as string,
		qte_ecoulement as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		distributeur as string,
		agence_code as string,
		marque as string,
		{Code postal} as string,
		marque_name as string,
		qte_ecc as string,
		ca_ecoulement as string,
		data_origin as string,
		{Ecoulement origin} as string,
		canal_final as string,
		{ATC performance} as string,
		Canal as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['MABILE_QTE_NULL.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> MabileQteNull
leftOuterOrganisation sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		{Marque DESC} as string,
		{Marque Code} as string,
		{Sous Famille} as string,
		{Référence Article Fournisseur} as string,
		{Agence Code} as string,
		{Département ID} as string,
		{Quantité en UV BL} as string,
		yearmonth as string,
		year as string,
		month as string,
		POSid as string,
		WholeSalerID as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		BrandID as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['MABILE_ORGANISATION_NOTFOUND.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> organisationNotFound
innerOrganisation sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Org_commerciale as string,
		{Canal distribution} as string,
		{Secteur d'activit�} as string,
		{Document de vente} as string,
		Poste as string,
		{Jour calendaire} as string,
		{Agence commerciale corrig�} as string,
		{ATC Corrig�} as string,
		{Donneur d'ordre} as string,
		{Recept de march} as string,
		{Destinataire facture} as string,
		{Type doc vente} as string,
		{Type de poste} as string,
		Livraison as string,
		{Type de livraison} as string,
		{Type poste Livraison} as string,
		Facture as string,
		{Type de facture} as string,
		{Type poste Facture} as string,
		{Mois calendrier} as string,
		{Ann�e civile} as string,
		{Motif commande} as string,
		{CA cd�} as string,
		{Qt� livr�e} as string,
		{CA livr�} as string,
		{Qt� factur�e} as string,
		{CA factur�} as string,
		{Cout standard cd�} as string,
		{Cout fabrication} as string,
		{Cout standard livr�} as string,
		{Cout standard factur�} as string,
		date_id as string,
		year as string,
		yearmonth as string,
		qt_cd_e as string,
		ca_cd_ as string,
		qt_factur_e as string,
		ca_factur_ as string,
		reference as string,
		WholeSalerID as string,
		WholeSalerHubID as string,
		HubName as string,
		{P�riode} as string,
		Offre as string,
		month as string,
		qte_ecoulement as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		distributeur as string,
		agence_code as string,
		marque as string,
		{Code postal} as string,
		marque_name as string,
		qte_ecc as string,
		ca_ecoulement as string,
		data_origin as string,
		{Ecoulement origin} as string,
		canal_final as string,
		{ATC performance} as string,
		Canal as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['mabileBeforeDecremation.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> beforedecrementation
